title: Backend Project - Happy thoughts API

description: A project focuses on how to use MongoDB to store data and how to query that data from your API. I retrieved data from Kaggle and convert it to JSON file.

title: Quiz with Redux
description: A group project to create a quiz with main focus on learning how to use Redux.

title: Project Survey
description: Responsive website that is a typeform-like survey for collecting data from your users, built in React

description: Weather app made by using HTML, CSS and JavaScript ES6 for fetching data from API and funtionality
